scripts.version:upgrade: lerna run build && lerna version --conventional-commits --create-release github
scripts.sandbox:upgrade: npx rimraf sandbox && npx @angular/cli new sandbox --routing=true --skipGit=true --skipInstall=true --style scss && cd sandbox && ng config cli.packageManager yarn && yarn && yarn lint && yarn ng test --watch=false --progress=false --source-map=false
scripts.sandbox-workspace:upgrade: npx rimraf sandboxworkspace && npx @angular/cli new sandboxworkspace --createApplication=false --routing=true --skipGit=true --skipInstall=true --style scss && cd sandboxworkspace && ng config cli.packageManager yarn && yarn && ng generate application sandbox --routing=true --style scss && ng generate application sandbox2 --routing=true --style scss && yarn lint && yarn ng test --watch=false --progress=false --source-map=false
scripts.sandbox:run:app-insights: cd sandbox && yarn ng add @objectivity/angular-schematic-app-insights --instrumentationKey key
scripts.sandbox-workspace:run:app-insights: cd sandboxworkspace && yarn ng add @objectivity/angular-schematic-app-insights --instrumentationKey key
scripts.sandbox:run:ui-framework: cd sandbox && yarn ng add @objectivity/angular-schematic-ui-framework --material false --bootstrap-mini && yarn ng g @objectivity/angular-schematic-ui-framework:material --theme indigo-pink
scripts.sandbox-workspace:run:ui-framework: cd sandboxworkspace && yarn ng add @objectivity/angular-schematic-ui-framework --material false --bootstrap-mini && yarn ng g @objectivity/angular-schematic-ui-framework:material --theme indigo-pink
scripts.sandbox:clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.sandbox-workspace:clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandboxworkspace && git clean -f -d sandboxworkspace
scripts.unlink:windows: lerna exec -- npx manage-linked-packages -m yarn -a reset -n %LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME%
scripts.unlink:linux: lerna exec -- npx manage-linked-packages -m yarn -a reset -n $LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME
scripts.sandbox:run:all: yarn sandbox:clean && yarn sandbox:run:ide && yarn sandbox:run:web-ci && yarn sandbox:run:ui-framework && yarn sandbox:run:web-setup && yarn sandbox:run:app-insights
scripts.sandbox-workspace:run:all: yarn sandbox-workspace:clean && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:ide && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:web-ci && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:ui-framework && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:web-setup && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:app-insights
scripts.sandbox:test: cd sandbox && yarn lint && yarn ng test --watch=false --progress=false --source-map=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCI && yarn build
scripts.sandbox-workspace:test: cd sandboxworkspace && yarn lint && yarn ng test sandbox --watch=false --progress=false --source-map=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCI && yarn build
scripts.ci:sandbox: yarn link && yarn sandbox:install && yarn sandbox:run:all && yarn sandbox:test
scripts.ci:sandbox-workspace: yarn link && yarn sandbox-workspace:install && yarn sandbox-workspace:run:all && yarn sandbox-workspace:test
